title: Projects & Events
subtitle: Discover our ongoing initiatives and join upcoming events that are shaping sustainable communities across Tamil Nadu.

projects.title: Community Garden Initiative
projects.description: Establishing sustainable community gardens in urban areas to promote local food production and community bonding.

projects.title: Organic Farming Training Program
projects.description: Comprehensive 6-month program teaching sustainable farming techniques to local farmers.

projects.title: Seed Library Project
projects.description: Creating a community seed bank to preserve native varieties and promote biodiversity.
